Package com.nnk.springboot.repository

Class RatingRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nnk.springboot.repository.RatingRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RatingRepositoryInterface
    @Component
public class RatingRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements RatingRepositoryInterface
    This class allows to prepare queries for the rating table and send them to the database configured
